title: 50,000 LP Gas cylinders will be delivered on 1st June
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas said that 50,000 Domestic LP Gas cylinders (12.5 kg, 5kg & 2.3kg) distribution will take place on Wednesday (1st June).
The dealer list with available stocks are updated on www.litrogas.com, said Litro Gas Lanka Ltd
Saving lives from drowning for over seven decades, Sri Lanka Life Saving marks 75 years
